text: Kuma Mun rubuta a kansu, a cikinta cewa, lalle (ana kashe) rai saboda rai, kuma (ana ɗebe) ido saboda ido, kuma (ana katse) hanci saboda hanci, kuma kunne saboda kunne kuma haƙori saboda haƙori kuma a raunuka a yi sakayya. To, wanda ya yi sadaka da shi, to, shi kaffara ce a gare shi. Kuma wanda bai yi hukunci ba da abin da Allah Ya saukar, to, waɗannan su ne azzalumai
